attributes.description: THIS IS THE MOST EXCITING PRODUCT TO HIT THE SA MARKET IN A VERY LONG TIME. In my opinion, the Chinese manufacturers are now where the Koreans were 10 years ago when they launched the new generation HYUNDAI I30. They were making a good quality product at an affordable price. The Koreans are still making a good product, but the price is no longer so affordable with their entry level S.U.V now selling for over R500 000. Enter the BAIC X25, SUPER SPACIOUS AND COMFORTABLE, SO SMOOTH AND EASY TO DRIVE THIS IS THE TOP OF THE RANGE FASHION SPEC AND COMES FULLY LOADED WITH ALL THE EXTRAS AND LUXURIES INCLUDING GLASS SUNROOF AND REVERSE CAMERA Make no mistake, the build quality and overall feel of this vehicle is also brilliant. THE 11 BILLION SPENT ON A STATEOFTHEART PRODUCTION PLANT IN P.E MEANS THAT THIS MANUFACTURER IS HERE TO STAY. The car comes with a 5 YEAR120 000 KM factory warranty which equals 100 peace of mind motoring We have a fully accredited BAIC workshop on site to cater for all your parts and maintenance needs. IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A COOLER OR BETTER VALUE BRAND NEW SPACIOUS AUTOMATIC HATCH AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE.
